title.narrative: LEARNING OUTCOMES

description.narrative: 1.3 Educational learning outcomes for girls and boys enhanced and relevant to the country's development potential, which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, Cabo Verdeans, particularly the most vulnerable, have improved access to, and use more quality health and education services, and benefit more from social and child protection and social inclusion, which are gender-sensitive, throughout their life cycle

mailing-address.narrative: P.O. Box 62 Meio de Achada Santo Antonio Praia

sector.narrative: System strengthening - Evidence based education sector planning
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities

description.narrative: The introduction of modern and innovative techniques through digital learning and alternative education, made it possible to overcome the effects of the pandemic crisis in the education sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/02/2022
